short_summary: Stage 2 - Banff East Gate Phase 1, Banff National Park
description: 5P468-23-0081/A: Stage 2 - Banff East Gate Phase 1, Banff National Park \\n \\n SAR: \\n \\nPark Canada requires a qualified contractor to construct a new utility building and associated underground utility installation to support a future utility upgrade to the East Gate Operations buildings. The new building will have all new electrical service and distribution equipment. Phase 1 of construction will include a new raw water line, sanitary line with tie-in to existing manhole, installation of new electrical service and associated underground conduit installation to both maintain existing services and prepare for future phases of construction. Existing buildings on-site will remain in place with temporary connections required during construction activities and prior to Phase 2 work. \\n \\n TWO STAGE SELECTION PROCESS \\n\\\This posting is the Stage Two of a two-stage solicitation process: the first stage was to evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers. The second stage (Stage Two) is to invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Construction and Services for Banff East Gate**

**Title:** Stage 2 - Banff East Gate Phase 1

**Reference Number:** CB-6961-93607920

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0081/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-05

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-19 16:00:00

## Project Overview

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the construction of a new utility building and associated underground utility installation to support a future utility upgrade to the East Gate Operations buildings. The project involves a two-stage selection process, with the first stage evaluating the qualifications of all interested suppliers and the second stage, the current stage, inviting qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.

## Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for designing, constructing, and installing a new raw water line, sanitary line with tie-in to existing manhole, and new electrical service and distribution equipment. Additionally, the contractor will be required to install underground conduit to maintain existing services and prepare for future phases of construction. All work must be carried out in accordance with the provided specifications and drawings.

**Scope of Work:**

* Construction of a new utility building
* Designing, constructing, and installing underground utility infrastructure
* Installation of new electrical service and distribution equipment
* Maintaining existing services and preparing for future phases of construction

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status:** Expired (Note: This tender has already closed)
* **GSIN:** None
* **UNSPSC:** Plumbing system maintenance or repair, New industrial building and warehouse construction services, Electrical system services, Electric power system construction service

## Amendments

* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-07-19

## Appendices

* **Attachments:** None

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 220 - 4 Avenue SE, Suite 720, Calgary, AB T2G 4X3
* **Contracting Entity Telephone:** (587) 832-1894
* **Contracting Entity Email:** kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca
* **End User Entity Name:** None
* **End User Entity Address:** None

## Notifications and Reminders

* **Notification Link:** None
* **Reminders:** None
